title: Komodo Dragons: Giant Reptiles
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 966 words, Level Q (Grade 3), Lexile 930L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     I and X
description: Komodo Dragons: Giant Reptiles will take students into the would of these huge lizards. Students will learn about their habitat and offspring as well as the challenges Komodo dragons face. Vibrant picutres support the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
